examples: There was a distinct smell of gas.
Había un olor distintivo a gas.
His voice was quiet but every word was distinct.
Su voz era tranquila pero cada palabra era distinta.
The results of the survey fell into two distinct groups.
Los resultados de la encuesta se dividieron en dos grupos distintos.
Jamaican reggae music is quite distinct from North American jazz or blues.
La música reggae jamaicana es bastante distinta del jazz o blues norteamericanos.
